rows.question_text: What of these relationships do you foresee to have with your child on their 20th birthday (choose all that apply)?

rows.option_2_text: The parents are cheering the kids as they play

rows.question_text: For me this practice is...
Why?
Which of the four main developmental stages does your child belong to?
How will you ensure that this child will grow well physically (growth)?
How will you ensure that this child will grow well cognitively (thinking)?
How will you ensure that this child will grow well emotionally (feelings)?
How will you ensure that this child will grow well socially (social awareness)?
Do you often see men in your community doing the things Ssemakula does with his wife and family?
Have you learnt anything new from the story?
Who spends more time in a day doing activities that relate directly to child upbringing?
How does participation affect parent-child relationships?
What factors contribute to men’s limited participation in child care?
What are the benefits of men participating in child care?
What can be done to promote more equitable distribution of labour in the households?
How do you think a man can properly care for the pictures and objects that were in the woman’s box? Why?
How do you think a woman can properly care for the pictures and objects that were in the man’s box? Why?
What would you change to improve your own role in taking care of your children?
What is the difference between low risk drinking and excessive drinking that leads to problems? What are the signs that one is drinking excessively?
Do you think men/women drink alcohol to be ‘real men’ or ‘real women’? Why?
How does it influence marital violence?
How would you help your partner to control the problem of excessive drinking?
What do you like about marriage?
What don’t you like about marriage?

Why did Dorotia and the lady at the barrelate differently
with Adome?

Why is it good or bad for married couples to relate like those
in the story?
What would make you lose interest in intimacy with your partner?
How do most married people communicate about matters of intimacy?
Which sessions did you find most useful/interesting?
Activities did you find most useful/interesting?
What sessions did you find unhelpful/least useful?
Why is it important for men and women to discuss parenting and spousal relationships together?
How can both men and women be helped to participate in parenting alongside each other.
How would a supportive parent react based on the story above?
What happens when young people’s behavior goes against their parents' values? What is the best way to handle this if its a sexuality concern?
What happens if their behavior goes against the religious or spiritual values they were taught? What is the best way to handle it if it's a sexuality concern?
What influences young people to behave in ways that are consistent with their values?
What influences young people to behave in ways that are different from their values (possible answers
How can we help our children to modify the unfair norms and practices boys and girls are subjected to?
How can you help modify, at the community level, some of the unfair norms and practices men and women are subjected to?
Identify the five most common issues mothers and fathers argue about in regard to parenting.
Identify five techniques by which a couple can resolve disagreement in a respectful and constructive way.
Mention one lesson from this parenting programme that we will take with you into your future parenting journey.
How do you wish to support each other after the programme?
How do you plan to reach others who did not participate in the programme?
What one important thing, other than money, do you wish to receive from the implementers of the programme in future?
What kind of support do you need from the sub county/ district?
